00008 /* This is not thread-safe, but it doesn't matter what gets written to this when. */
00009 static struct nullstream: std::ostream {
00010     struct nullbuf: std::streambuf {
00011       int overflow(int c) { return traits_type::not_eof(c); }
00012     } m_sbuf;
00013     nullstream(): std::ios(&m_sbuf), std::ostream(&m_sbuf) {}
00014 } gDevNull;
00015 
00016 
00017 std::ostream* ORLogger::fgMyOstream = &std::cout;
00018 std::ostream* ORLogger::fgMyNullstream = &gDevNull;
00019 bool ORLogger::fgIsInitialized = false;
00020 std::map<pthread_t, std::pair<ORLogger::ESeverity, std::ostream*> > ORLogger::fgLoggerMap;
00021 ORReadWriteLock ORLogger::fgRWLock;
00022 
00023 std::ostream& ORLogger::msg(pthread_t thread, ORLogger::ESeverity severity, const char* location)
00024 {
00025   std::ostream* theThreadStream;
00026   ORLogger::ESeverity theThreadSeverity;
00027 
00028   /* critical part */
00029   fgRWLock.readLock();
00030   std::map<pthread_t, std::pair<ORLogger::ESeverity, std::ostream* > >::iterator anIter = fgLoggerMap.find(thread);
00031   if (anIter != fgLoggerMap.end()) {
00032     theThreadStream = anIter->second.second;
00033     theThreadSeverity = anIter->second.first;
00034     fgRWLock.unlock();
00035   } else {
00036     fgRWLock.unlock();
00037     theThreadSeverity = ORLogger::kRoutine;
00038     theThreadStream = GetORLoggerOStream(thread); 
00039   }
00040   /* end critical part. */
00041   if (severity >= theThreadSeverity) {
00042     *theThreadStream << toString(severity) << ": " << "(pid: " << getpid() << "): " << location << ": ";
00043   } else {
00044     return *fgMyNullstream ;
00045   }
00046 
00047   if ( severity == kFatal ){
00048     if (severity >= theThreadSeverity) *theThreadStream << std::endl;
00049     //::abort();  
00050     /* When we're striving for safety, abort takes down the whole shebang! */
00051     pthread_exit((void *) 0);
00052   }
00053   return *theThreadStream;
00054 }
00055 
00056 std::ostream* ORLogger::GetORLoggerOStream(pthread_t thread) 
00057 {
00058   std::ostream* theThreadStream;
00059   fgRWLock.readLock();
00060   std::map<pthread_t, std::pair<ORLogger::ESeverity, std::ostream* > >::iterator anIter = fgLoggerMap.find(thread);
00061 
00062   if ( anIter != fgLoggerMap.end() ) {
00063     theThreadStream = anIter->second.second; 
00064     fgRWLock.unlock();
00065   } else {
00066     /* Insert with default severity, ostream. */ 
00067     fgRWLock.unlock();
00068     fgRWLock.writeLock();
00069     if (fgLoggerMap.size() > 0) {
00070       /* If the map already has one, then the others get /dev/null */
00071       fgLoggerMap.insert(
00072         std::pair< pthread_t, std::pair<ORLogger::ESeverity, std::ostream*> >(thread, 
00073         std::pair<ORLogger::ESeverity, std::ostream*>(ORLogger::kRoutine, fgMyNullstream)));
00074       theThreadStream = fgMyNullstream;
00075     } else {
00076       fgLoggerMap.insert(
00077         std::pair< pthread_t, std::pair<ORLogger::ESeverity, std::ostream*> >(thread, 
00078         std::pair<ORLogger::ESeverity, std::ostream*>(ORLogger::kRoutine, fgMyOstream)));
00079       theThreadStream = fgMyOstream;
00080     }
00081     fgRWLock.unlock();
00082   } 
00083   return theThreadStream;
00084 }
00085 
00086 ORLogger::ESeverity ORLogger::GetORLoggerSeverity(pthread_t thread) 
00087 {
00088   ORLogger::ESeverity theSeverity;
00089   fgRWLock.readLock();
00090   std::map<pthread_t, std::pair<ORLogger::ESeverity, std::ostream* > >::iterator anIter = fgLoggerMap.find(thread);
00091   if ( anIter != fgLoggerMap.end() ) {
00092     theSeverity = anIter->second.first; 
00093     fgRWLock.unlock();
00094   } else {
00095     /* Insert with default severity, ostream. */ 
00096     fgRWLock.unlock();
00097     fgRWLock.writeLock();
00098     if (fgLoggerMap.size() > 0) {
00099       /* If the map already has one, then the others get /dev/null */
00100       fgLoggerMap.insert(
00101         std::pair< pthread_t, std::pair<ORLogger::ESeverity, std::ostream*> >(thread, 
00102         std::pair<ORLogger::ESeverity, std::ostream*>(ORLogger::kRoutine, fgMyNullstream)));
00103     } else {
00104       fgLoggerMap.insert(
00105         std::pair< pthread_t, std::pair<ORLogger::ESeverity, std::ostream*> >(thread, 
00106         std::pair<ORLogger::ESeverity, std::ostream*>(ORLogger::kRoutine, fgMyOstream)));
00107     }
00108     fgRWLock.unlock();
00109     theSeverity = ORLogger::kRoutine;
00110   } 
00111   return theSeverity;
00112 }

00114 void ORLogger::SetORLoggerOStream(pthread_t thread, std::ostream* aStream)
00115 {
00116   if (aStream == NULL) aStream = fgMyNullstream;
00117   fgRWLock.writeLock();
00118   std::map<pthread_t, std::pair<ORLogger::ESeverity, std::ostream* > >::iterator anIter = fgLoggerMap.find(thread);
00119   if ( anIter != fgLoggerMap.end() ) {
00120     anIter->second.second = aStream; 
00121   } else {
00122     /* Insert with default severity. */ 
00123     fgLoggerMap.insert(
00124       std::pair< pthread_t, std::pair<ORLogger::ESeverity, std::ostream*> >(thread, 
00125       std::pair<ORLogger::ESeverity, std::ostream*>(ORLogger::kRoutine, aStream)));
00126   }
00127   fgRWLock.unlock();
00128 }

00131 void ORLogger::SetORLoggerSeverity(pthread_t thread, ORLogger::ESeverity severity)
00132 {
00133   fgRWLock.writeLock();
00134   std::map<pthread_t, std::pair<ORLogger::ESeverity, std::ostream* > >::iterator anIter = fgLoggerMap.find(thread);
00135   if ( anIter != fgLoggerMap.end()) {
00136     anIter->second.first = severity; 
00137   } else {
00138     /* Insert with default ostream. */ 
00139     if (fgLoggerMap.size() > 0) {
00140       /* If the map already has one, then the others get /dev/null */
00141       fgLoggerMap.insert(
00142         std::pair< pthread_t, std::pair<ORLogger::ESeverity, std::ostream*> >(thread, 
00143         std::pair<ORLogger::ESeverity, std::ostream*>(severity, fgMyNullstream)));
00144     } else {
00145       fgLoggerMap.insert(
00146         std::pair< pthread_t, std::pair<ORLogger::ESeverity, std::ostream*> >(thread, 
00147         std::pair<ORLogger::ESeverity, std::ostream*>(severity, fgMyOstream)));
00148     }
00149   }
00150   fgRWLock.unlock();
00151 }
00152 
00153 std::string ORLogger::toString(ORLogger::ESeverity severity)
00154 {
00155   switch (severity) {
00156     case kDebug: return "Debug";
00157     case kTrace: return "Trace";
00158     case kRoutine: return "Routine";
00159     case kWarning: return "Warning";
00160     case kError: return "Error";
00161     case kFatal: return "Fatal";
00162     default:
00163       //ORLog(kWarning) << "unknown severity " << severity << ", assuming the worst..." << endl;
00164       return "Fatal";
00165   }
00166 }
